statements: SELECT * FROM images_videos;
SELECT id, image_url FROM images_videos WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_url, video_url FROM images_videos WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp FROM images_videos ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, video_url FROM images_videos WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, image_url, video_url, timestamp FROM images_videos WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM images_videos WHERE id = 10;
SELECT image_url, timestamp FROM images_videos WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, image_url FROM images_videos ORDER BY image_url ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT video_url FROM images_videos WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT id, image_path FROM images WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT image_path FROM images ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, image_path FROM images WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE drone_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, image_path, timestamp FROM images WHERE drone_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, video_path, timestamp FROM videos WHERE drone_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, image_path, timestamp FROM images WHERE drone_id = 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, video_path, timestamp FROM videos WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT drone_id, COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM images GROUP BY drone_id HAVING total_images > 5 ORDER BY total_images DESC;
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE id = 1
SELECT drone_id, image_url FROM Images ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, timestamp FROM Videos WHERE drone_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Drones ORDER BY drone_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE id = 1 AND drone_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_url, timestamp FROM Images WHERE drone_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT drone_id, COUNT(id) AS total_images FROM Images GROUP BY drone_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 10 ORDER BY total_images DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_videos FROM Videos WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-03-01';
SELECT Drones.drone_name, Videos.video_url FROM Drones INNER JOIN Videos ON Drones.id = Videos.drone_id WHERE Drones.status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_id, image_data FROM Images WHERE image_name = 'Example Image';
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM Images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT video_name FROM Videos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT drone_name, drone_model, drone_type FROM Drones WHERE drone_type = 'Quadcopter';
SELECT * FROM Surveillance;

SELECT drone_name, image_name, video_name FROM Drones, Images, Videos, Surveillance WHERE Drones.drone_id = Surveillance.drone_id AND Images.image_id = Surveillance.image_id AND Videos.video_id = Surveillance.video_id;
SELECT drone_name, timestamp FROM Drones, Surveillance WHERE Drones.drone_id = Surveillance.drone_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_name FROM Images WHERE image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM Surveillance);
SELECT drone_name, COUNT(*) AS video_count FROM Drones, Surveillance WHERE Drones.drone_id = Surveillance.drone_id AND video_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY drone_name ORDER BY video_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_url, drone_id FROM images WHERE drone_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT drone_id FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT drone_id, COUNT(*) as image_count FROM images GROUP BY drone_id HAVING image_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT operation_name, start_time, end_time FROM surveillance_operations WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT video_url FROM videos WHERE drone_id = 2 LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_url, timestamp FROM images WHERE drone_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT operation_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM operation_logs GROUP BY operation_id HAVING log_count > 10;
